Title: Hiccup
Writer: Anckur Chaudhry (story and screenplay), Siddharth Malhotra (story and screenplay), Ambar Hadap (story and screenplay), Ganesh Pandit (story and screenplay), Anckur Chaudhry (dialogue)
Actors: Rani Mukerji, Neeraj Kabi, Jannat Zubair Rahmani, Sachin
Plot: Hichki presents a positive and inspiring story about a woman who turns her biggest weakness into her biggest strength.
